Label.en: During construction, the French public heavily protested the creation of the tower

Label.en: This also included several important public figures such as Charles Garnier, the architect of the Palais Opera..

Label.en: But our hero Eiffel vehemently defended it, comparing it to the pyramids of Egypt!
